To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $7,200. This is a fantastic deal, considering the value it brings. I look forward to hearing your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer
